question:
Which of the following kings captured Ghazni from Oguz Turkmen nomads?
1) Ghiyasuddin
2) Muizuddin
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Ghiyasuddin and Muizuddin the two nephews of Alauddin Hussain captured the city of Ghazni in 1173 CE from the Oguz Turkmen nomads who had ruled it since the fall of the Ghaznavids
